title: Millie the Mummy
description: Book one in the Halloween Town series. For children as young as 3 and as old as 7 can read these fun entertaining books by this award winning best selling children's author. Millie has been chosen to head the Halloween Party this year at Halloween Town School. She enlists the help of her fiends to create a Ghoulish time!
author: Amelia Picklewiggle
